explains: n. （尤指因某人去世引起的）悲伤，悲痛；伤心事，悲痛事；<非正式>麻烦，烦恼
wordGroup: come to grief 遭难，失败
good grief 哎呀！天哪！（表示诧异， 吃惊， 恐惧的感叹语）

sentences.en: She was out of her mind with grief.
For months he was prostrated with grief.
sentences.cn: 他好几个月都悲痛不已。

sentences.en: Julia's soft heart was touched by his grief.
sentences.cn: 朱莉娅心肠软，见他悲伤动了恻隐之心。
